shared.tester

Class RecallTestMetric

  • java.lang.Object
    • shared.tester.TestMetric
      • shared.tester.RecallTestMetric

  • public class RecallTestMetric
extends TestMetric
    A test metric for recall. Recall is defined as (true positives) /(true positives + false negatives). Only the first value of the label is used to determine true/false.
    Author:
    shashir
